missionstate.description: Gather the material Tereban listed. Talk to him about your mission when you have given him everything he was looking for.
You brought all the required materials to Tereban and guaranteed his sons a great birthday party.
Find the wyvern Heoni in the Edron mountains and take his sinew to Tereban.
You delivered Heoni's sinew to Tereban.
Find the special wood in the barbarian camps of Hrodmir and bring it to Tereban. It might be a good idea to start looking in the northernmost camp.
You delivered the Wood to Tereban.
Find the spectral cloth hidden deep in the crypts of the isle of the kings and bring it to Tereban. You might have to look for a secret entrance.
You delivered the spectral cloth to Tereban.
Find exquisite silk in the spider caves of southern Zao and deliver it to Tereban.
You brought Tereban the required silk.
Find a magic crystal in the tomb buried under the sand east of Ankrahmun and bring it to Tereban.
Tereban received the magic crystal he was looking for.
Find the mystic root under the city of Banuta and bring it to Tereban.
The magic root was delievered to Tereban.
Find some old iron in the mines of Kazordoon for Tereban. Don't get lost - start searching close to the city.
Tereban got the old iron he required.
Find the dragon Glitterscale in the caves north of Thais and take its scale to Tereban.
You handed the looted scale to Tereban.

mission.name: Daily Minor: Crystal Keeper
mission.description: Use the repair crystal to repair five damaged blue crystal in the crystal caves. Damaged crystals will not glow. |STATE| / 5

mission.name: Daily Minor: Raiders of the lost Spark
mission.description: Kill crystal crushers and use discharger item on the corpse to collect their charges. Gather 7 charges and report back. |STATE| / 7

mission.name: Daily Minor Plus: Exterminators
mission.description: Kill 10 of the wigglers for the gnomes. Then report back to the gnomes. |STATE| / 10

mission.name: Daily Minor Plus: Mushroom Digger
mission.description: Find a truffle sniffing pig and lure it around. Occasionally it will unearth some truffles. Use the baby pig on the truffles to feed it 3 times. Then report back to the gnomes. |STATE| / 3

missionstate.description: You have to enter the crystal caves and find a crystal that is fitting the crystal you got from the gnomes. Use the crystal on one of the bigger red crystal in the caves to bond them.
You have finished this quest for now.

mission.name: Daily Major: The Tinker's Bell
mission.description: Use the harmonic bell on the mad golems in the golem workshop so that they will automatically be teleported to the gnomish workshops. Then report back to the gnomes. |STATE| / 4

missionstate.description: Talk to Sven about mead and give him a honeycomb. For each honeycomb you will be allowed 20 sips.
Now drink from the bucket until you drink 10 sips in a row without passing out
You have completed this Test! Talk to Sven about the mead.

Sven gave you a Mead Horn. Fill it with mead from the bucket behind Sven (brown contents) and then proceed to the sleeping bear. The bear is inside a small ice cave in the north. Use the full mead horn on the bear so it becomes unconscious, then use the bear to hug it.
You hugging the bear! Go tell Sven that you hugged the bear!
You have completed this Test!
Go to the north-west of Svargrond and find the Mammoth. Drink your three mugs of mead, stand in front of the Mammoth and push it. Just use it...
You pushed the Mammoth! Go tell Sven that you pushed the Mammoth!
You have completed this Test! You can now be a citizen of Svargrond!
Your Mission is to go to a little camp of lizards at north-east of the Dragonblaze Peaks. You have to find and deliver the Tactical map complete the mission.
You delivered the Tactical map to Zalamon.
Go to the Temple of Equilibrium (it's marked on your map) and find out what happened there.
The temple has been corrupted and is lost. Zalamon should be informed about this as soon as possible.
You already reported Zalamon about the Temple! Ask him for new mission!
Go into the small camp Chaochai to the north of the Dragonblaze Peaks (Zalamon marks the entrance on your map). There are 3 buildings which you have to spy
You spied 1 of 3 buildings of the camp.
You spied 2 of 3 buildings of the camp.
You spied 3 of 3 buildings of the camp. Zalamon should be informed about this as soon as possible.
You already reported Zalamon about the camp! Ask him for new mission!

Get the poison from Zalamon's storage room. Then go to the teleporter to the Muggy Plains and head east from there to the rice fields. Go to the very top rice field and use the poison anywhere on the water.
The rice has been poisoned. This will weaken the Emperor's army significantly. Return and tell Zalamon about your success.
You already reported Zalamon about your success! Ask him for new mission!
Your mission is to find a way to enter the north of the valley and find a passage to the great gate itself. Search any temples or settlements you come across for hidden passages.
Report Zalamon about the strange symbols that you found.
Get the greasy oil from Zalamon's storage room and put them on the levers that you found.
Due to being extra greasy, the leavers can now be moved.
You found the right combination for the puzzle in the mountains and triggered some kind of mechanism. You should head back to Zalamon to report your success.
You already reported Zalamon about your success! You got a Tome of Knowledge as reward! Ask him for new mission!
Your mission is to use the portal in the chamber beyond the mechanism. It will lead you to the great gate.
Eternal guardians and lizard chosen has been awaken. Survive them and report it to Zalamon!
You Survived the Waves and reported Zalamon about your success! You got a Serpent Crest as reward!

mission.name: The Marid and the Efreet - Djinn Greeting

missionstate.description: Melchior told you the word "Djanni'hah" which can be used to talk to Djinns. Be aware that once you become an ally of one Djinn race, you cannot switch sides anymore.

mission.name: The Marid and the Efreet - Marid Faction

missionstate.description: You have joined the Marid. These friendly, blue Djinns are honest and fair allies. You have pledged eternal loyalty to King Gabel and may enter Asha'daramai freely. Djanni'hah!

mission.name: The Efreet and the Efreet - Efreet Faction

missionstate.description: You have joined the Efreet. These evil, green Djinns are always up to mischievous pranks. You have pledged eternal loyalty to King Malor and may enter Mal'ouquah freely. Djanni'hah!
Big Ben, the cyclops in Ab'Dendriel sends you to bring him 3 bast skirts for his woman. After this he will help you to forge different steel.
Big Ben, the cyclops in Ab'Dendriel will help you to forge different steel now. Just ask him if you need something.
Marina, the mermaid north of Sabrehaven sends you to bring her 50 honeycombs. After this she will help you create spool of yarn.
Marina, the mermaid north of Sabrehaven will help you to create a spool of yarn from 10 pieces of spider silk. Just ask her if you need something.
Quentin told you about an old prayer which can bind holy energy to an object. Each of its ten lines has to be recited by a different priest though. Bring Quentin a wooden stake from Gamon to start.
You received Quentin's prayer: "Light shall be near - and darkness afar". Now, bring your stake to Tibra in the Carlin church for the next line of the prayer.
You received Tibra's prayer: "Hope may fill your heart - doubt shall be banned". Now, bring your stake to Maealil in the Elven settlement for the next line of the prayer.
You received Maealil's prayer: "Peace may fill your soul - evil shall be cleansed". Now, bring your stake to Yberius in the Venore temple for the next line of the prayer.
You received Yberius' prayer: "Protection will be granted - from dangers at hand". Now, bring your stake to Isimov in the dwarven settlement for the next line of the prayer.
You received Isimov's prayer: "Unclean spirits shall be repelled". Now, bring your stake to Amanda in Edron for the next line of the prayer.
You received Amanda's prayer: "Wicked curses shall be broken". Now, bring your stake to Kasmir in Darashia for the next line of the prayer.
You received Kasmir's prayer: "Let there be honour and humility". Now, bring your stake to Rahkem in Ankrahmun for the next line of the prayer.
You received Rahkem's prayer: "Let there be power and compassion". Now, bring your stake to Brewster in Port Hope for the next line of the prayer.
You received Brewster's prayer: "Your hand shall be guided - your feet shall walk in harmony". Now, bring your stake to Tyrias in Liberty Bay for the next line of the prayer.
You received Tyrias' prayer: "Your mind shall be a vessel for joy, light and wisdom". He wasn't exactly happy though and said that if you need some mumbo jumbo again, you should rather go to Chondur.
Chondur was surprised to hear that you had to travel through all of Tibia to have your wooden stake blessed. He offered you help with the blessing if you should need one again in the future.
You've become the apprentice of Maltre Jean Pierre. The first dish he will teach you to prepare is Rotworm Stew. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the first dish, the second dish he will teach you to prepare is Hydra Tongue Salad. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the second dish, the third dish he will teach you to prepare is Roasted Dragon Wings. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the third dish, the fourth dish he will teach you to prepare is Tropical Fried Terrorbird. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the fourth dish, the fifth dish he will teach you to prepare is Banana Chocolate Shake. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the fifth dish, the sixth dish he will teach you to prepare is Veggie Casserole. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the sixth dish, the seventh dish he will teach you to prepare is Filled Jalapeno Peppers. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the seventh dish, the eight dish he will teach you to prepare is Blessed Steak. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the eight dish, the ninth dish he will teach you to prepare is Northern Fishburger. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the ninth dish, the tenth dish he will teach you to prepare is Carrot Cake. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the tenth dish. You are now able to obtain the cookbook from Jean Pierre's room upstairs.
The eleventh dish he will teach you to prepare is Coconut Shrimp Bake. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the eleventh dish, the twelfth dish he will teach you to prepare is Blackjack. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the twelfth dish, the thirteenth dish he will teach you to prepare is Demonic Candy Balls. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed the thirteenth dish, the fourteenth dish he will teach you to prepare is Sweet Mangonaise Elixir. Bring him the ingredients he told you.
You have completed all the dishes. You are now able to make all the dishes in any order you want.
Palimuth asked you to help with some sewer malfunctions. You will need a Crowbar, there are 4 places where you need to go marked with an X on your map.
You cleaned 1 pipe of 4 from the garbage.
You cleaned 2 pipes of 4 from the garbage.
You cleaned 3 pipes of 4 from the garbage.
You cleaned 4 pipes of 4 from the garbage. Go back to Palimuth and report your mission
You cleaned all pipes from the garbage! Go back to Palimuth and ask for mission.
You have to find all 7 guards and give a report to them.
You reported to 1 of 7 guards
You reported to 2 of 7 guards
You reported to 3 of 7 guards
You reported to 4 of 7 guards
You reported to 5 of 7 guards
You reported to 6 of 7 guards
You reported to 7 of 7 guards! Go back to Palimuth and ask for mission.
Get the notes in Palimuths room and read them. Talk to Palimuth again when you've read the notes.
Talk to Azerus the Yalahari in the city centre to get your next mission.
Get the notes behind the Yalahari and read them. Talk to Azerus again and ask him for mission when you've read the notes.
Ask Palimuth for mission.
First you will need to kill the three plague bearers and then get The Alchemists' Formulas. When this have been done head back to either Palimuth (good side) or Yalahari (Azerus) (bad side).
Ask Azerus the Yalahari for a mission.
Ask Palimuth for mission.

For this mission you are asked to go to the Trade Quarter and negotiate or threaten Mr. West. Once again you will gain access to the mechanism although if you choose to help Palimuth you should go through the sewers.
You decided to help Palimuth, report him your mission.
You decided to help Azerus, report him your mission.
Get back to Azerus and report him your mission.
Ask Azerus for a mission.
Ask Palimuth for mission.
On this mission you are asked to find a druid by the name of Tamerin, on the Arena Quarter. You now have permission to use the gates mechanism.
The first is to bring Tamerin a flask of Animal Cure, you can buy this from Siflind on Nibelor (northeast of Svargrond).
now you have to kill Morik the Gladiator and bring his helmet to Tamerin as proof.

Report back to Tamerin as he will listen to your request and you can now make your choice: Cattle for Palimuth (good side), Warbeasts for Yalahari (Azerus) (bad side). Then report the one you decided your mission.
You decided to help Palimuth, report him your mission.
You decided to help Azerus, report him your mission.
Ask Azerus for a mission.
Ask Palimuth for mission.

Yalahari (Azerus) orders you to travel to the Cemetery Quarter and find the Strange Carving. He gives you a Ghost Charm and tells you to charge it with the tormented souls of the ghosts there to be used as an energy source. Palimuth wants the Charged Ghost Charm in order to free those souls. You can new use the Cemetery Quarter mechanism now. Go to the big building in the Cemetery Quarter and use the Ghost Charm on the Strange Carving at the back of the room.
Good side: Go to Palimuth, ask him about your mission, and hand in the charm. Bad side: Ask about your mission to Yalahari (Azerus) and give it back.
Get back to Azerus and report him your mission.
Ask Azerus for a mission.
Ask Palimuth for mission.

Bad side: Yalahari (Azerus) will send you for a new mission to go to the Sunken Quarter and kill the Quara Leaders, Inky, Splasher and Sharptooth. Good side: Rather than fighting any Quara leaders Palimuth will instead send you to find the cause for the Quaras aggressive behavior. Find Maritima and talk to her about the Quara and she will explain what their problem is.
Get back to Palimuth and report him your mission.
You killed the Quarabosses. Ask Azerus for a mission.
Ask Azerus for a mission.
Ask Palimuth for mission.

Bad side: For this mission the Yalahari requests you go to the Factory Quarter and find a pattern crystal, which will be used to supply weapons to help take control of the city. Good side: Palimuth will send you there to use the crystal to supply food for the city.
Get back to Azerus and report him your mission.
Ask Azerus for a mission.

You now need to decide between supporting Palimuth or the Yalahari's goal. To choose Palimuth's good side go to him, and simply ask him for a mission mission. Likewise, to join the Yalahari (Azerus) (bad side) go to him and say the same.
you already decided!
Palimuth told you that a circle of Yalahari is planning some kind of ritual. They plan to create a portal for some powerful demons and to unleash them in the city to 'purge' it once and for all.
The entrance to their inner sanctum has been opened for you. Be prepared for a HARD battle! Better gather some friends to assist you.
Report back to whichever principal you have chosen to help and you will receive Yalaharian Outfits.
You got the access to the reward room. Choose carefully which reward you pick as you can only take one item.
You have completed the Quest!
