missionstate.description: Atrad wants only two items from you for his old katana: a behemoth claw and a nose ring, both at the same time. He also told you about a "horned fox" who wears such as nose ring
You have received the second assassin addon.
Collect 100 pieces of minotaur leather and bring it to either Amber or Lubo to have them make a backpack addon for you.
You delivered 100 pieces of minotaur leather. Some time is needed to make the backpack for you though. You should check back later and ask either Amber or Lubo for your backpack.
Collect a legion helmet, 100 chicken feathers and 50 honeycombs and bring them to either Hanna or Norma to have them make a feather hat addon for you.

Bron told you that his brother Ajax in Northport needs to learn that violence is not always the answer. He told you to make his brother angry, then show him that all he needed to do was say 'please' to fix the situation.
You will need to leave Ajax alone for an hour, then return to him.
Ajax told you that he has thought about it, and that violence is not always good. Return to Bron now, and tell him that Ajax said fist not always good
Bron mentioned that he has someone in his house that he doesn't like, and he wants you to get advice from Ajax about how to handle the situation. Go back to Ajax and ask him about Gelagos
Ajax told you his brother needs Fighting Spirit, and that you should get some from a Djinn and give it to him.
You brought Bron the Fighting Spirit. He acted a little strange.
In order to make a shirt as a present for Ajax, Bron wants you to bring him 50 Pieces of Red Cloth and 50 Pieces of Green Cloth.
Bron wants you to bring him 10 Spider Silk Yarn.
Bron wants you to bring him the Warrior's Sweat.
You brought him all required items! accept it!
You got the Barbarian Wig Addon! Bring now the present from Bron to Ajax!
Bring Ajax in Northport 100 Iron Ore.
Bring Ajax 1 Huge Chunk of Crude Iron.
Bring Ajax 50 Perfect Behemoth Fang
Bring Ajax 50 Lizard Leather
Come later in 2 hours and ask Ajax for the axe.
You got the Axe Addon!
Your current task is to bring Hugo 20 pieces of brown cloth, like the worn and ragged ghoul clothing.
Your current task is to bring 50 pieces of minotaur leather to Hugo. If you don't know how to get leather, you should ask Kalvin.
Your current task is to bring 10 bat wings to Hugo.
Your current task is to bring 30 heaven blossoms to Hugo. Elves are said to cultivate these flowers.
You brought all items required for the "poor man's look" to Hugo. He told you to come back to him after a whole day has passed, then the outfit should be finished.
You got the outfit!
Ceiron sends you to collect a sample of the blooming Griffinclaw.
Ask Ceiron for task.

take Ceirons waterskin and try to fill it with water from this special trickle. In the mountains between Ankrahmun and Tiquanda are two hydra lairs. It is important that you take the water directly from the trickle, not from the pond
Ask Ceiron for task.
Bring Ceiron 100 ounces of demon dust.
Ask Ceiron for task.
The last mission is to find and retrieve Ceiron's Wolf Tooth Chain lost inside the Orc Fortress.
Ask Ceiron for Faolan.
Head over to Cormaya, find A Majestic Warwolf's Cave and ask her about an addon.
You got the Outfit!
Elane sends you to Liberty Bay to bring her the Crossbow from the Cult.
Bring Elane 100 pieces of lizard leather and 100 pieces of red dragon leather.
Bring Elane 5 enchanted chicken wings.
Bring Elane one piece of royal steel, draconian steel and hell steel each.
You got the Outfit!
Your current task is to bring 100 perfect behemoth fangs to Gregor in Thais.
Your current task is to retrieve the helmet of Ramsay the Reckless from Banuta. These pesky apes steal everything they can get their dirty hands on.
Your current task is to obtain a flask of warrior's sweat, which can be magicially extracted from headgear worn by a true warrior, but only in small amounts. Djinns are said to be good at this.
Your current task is to bring royal steel to Gregor in Thais. Royal steel can only be refined by very skilled smiths.
You have delivered all items required for the helmet addon. Go talk to Sam and tell him Gregor sent you. He will be glad to refine your helmet.
Sam is currently creating the helmet for you. Be patient and don't forget to check on it later!
You found Angelina in a Prison. She told you a secret: Lynda in Thais can create a blessed wand. Greet her from Angelina, maybe she will aid you.
Lynda send you to bring her a sample of all five wands and five rods (Snakebite, Moonlight, Necrotic, Terra, Hailstorm, Vortex, Dragonbreath, Decay, Cosmic Energy and Inferno)
Bring Lynda 10 ounces of magic sulphur
Bring Lynda the Necromancer's soul stone
Bring Lynda 20 ankhs now to complete the ritual.
You got the Outfit!
Now you can get a lottery ticket at Sandra for 100 empty vials.
You got the Outfit! Now you can get for a lottery prize 50000 gold!

mission.name: Female Mage and Male Summoner Addon: Headgear

missionstate.description: Your current task is to bring 70 bat wings to Myra in Port Hope.
Your current task is to bring 20 pieces of red cloth to Myra in Port Hope. These are said to make an excellent material for a cape.
Your current task is to bring 40 pieces of ape fur to Myra in Port Hope.
Your current task is to bring 35 holy orchids to Myra in Port Hope. Elves are said to cultivate these.
Your current task is to bring 10 spools of spider silk yarn to Myra in Port Hope. Only very large spiders produce silk which is strong enough to be yarned by mermaids.
Your current task is to bring 60 lizard scales to Myra in Port Hope. Lizard scales are great for all sort of magical potions.
Your current task is to bring 40 red dragon scales to Myra in Port Hope.
Your current task is to bring 15 ounces of magic sulphur to Myra in Port Hope. Djinns are said to be good at extracting magic sulphur.
Your current task is to bring 30 ounces of vampire dusts to Myra in Port Hope. You might need to ask a priest for a special blessed stake to turn vampires into dust.
You finally collected all of the items which Myra asked for. Go talk to Zoltan in Edron and tell him that Myra nominated you for an award.
Bring Hjaern 5 frostheart shards to get the first Addon. Ask him for shard!
Bring Hjaern 10 frostheart shards to get the second Addon. Ask him for shard!
You got the Outfit Addons! You can trade the rest shards to Hjaern for 2000 gold each!
Your current task is to bring 100 hardened bones to Trisha in Carlin. They can sometimes be extracted from creatures that consist only of - you guessed it, bones. You need an obsidian knife though.
Your current task is to bring 100 turtle shells to Trisha in Carlin. Turtles can be found on some idyllic islands which have recently been discovered.
Your current task is to show that you have fighting spirit. Maybe someone grants you a wish...?
Your current task is to obtain a dragon claw. You cannot get this special claw from any common dragons in Tibia. It requires a special one, a lord among the lords.
You have delivered all items requried for the shoulder spike addon. Go talk to Cornelia and tell her Trisha sent you. She will be glad to create the should spikes.
Cornelia is currently creating the should spikes for you. Be patient and don't forget to check on it later!
You have obtained the shoulder spike addon.
Bring Lugri the Medusa shield!
Bring Lugri the Dragon Scale Mail!
Bring Lugri the Crown Legs!
Bring Lugri the Ring of the Sky!
You got the first Outfit Addon!
Bring The Queen Of The Banshees 50 Holy Orchids and she will reward you with the second addon.
You got the second Outfit Addon!
Bring Duncan 100 Eye Patches from pirates!
Bring Duncan 100 peg legs from pirates!
Bring Duncan 100 pirate hooks from pirates!
Go to Morgan and tell him this codeword: 'firebird' to get the outfit addon!
You got the Outfit Addon!
Your current task is to find a mermaid's comb. If you have ever encountered a mermaid, you should ask her. Bring the comb to Habdel if you are male or to Ishina if you are female.
You have received the first oriental addon.
Your current task is to bring 100 pieces of ape fur to Razan if you are male, or to Miraia if you are female.
Your current task is to bring 100 fish fins to Razan if you are male, or to Miraia if you are female.
Your current task is to bring 2 enchanted chicken wings to Razan if you are male, or to Miraia if you are female.
Your current task is to bring 100 pieces of blue cloth to Razan if you are male, or to Miraia if you are female.
You have received the second oriental addon.
Try to find a monster which sometimes lurks in the Tiquandian jungle as the revenge of the jungle against mankind. Bring the rare root it carries to Chondur as well as 5 voodoo dolls.
Your current task is to collect 5 tribal masks from the dworcs and 5 banana staves from the apes. Bring them to Chondur to earn your shamanic mask.
Sam sends you to see Kroox in Kazordoon to get a special dwarven armor. Just tell him, his old buddy Sam is sending you.
You have the permission to retrive a dwarven armor from the mines. The problem is, some giant spiders made the tunnels where the storage is their new home.
You have completed Dwarven Armor Quest!
Spectulus in Edron has sent you on a mission to find out the whereabouts of a certain inventor. A beggar in Edron seems to know more about this topic than he wants to tell.
The beggar turned out to be the inventor himself. You successfully convinced him to give you the only remaining plans of his creation. You should return to Spectulus in Edron to tell him the news.
You gave the plans to the astronomer. He began reconstructing the invention as soon as he got ahold of them. It will take a while for him to work out the problem which caused the initial failure.
You returned to Speculus who finally worked out the failure of the initial construction. He recapitulated the plans and needs only one item before he can start building the magic device.
Spectulus asked you to enter the Lost Mines beneath Edron and recover a rare crystal. In exchange for it you will gain access to the lair of the Collector who guards a vital component of the device.
Luckily, you survived the horrors of the Lost Mines and recovered a rare crystal. You should visit Spectulus in Edron to seek counsel on what to do next.
You returned to astronomer Spectulus and gave him the rare crystal.
In order to access the lair of the Collector, you will need to find the creature's well on an ice isle near Carlin. To donate the rare crystal overcome your greed and use it at the well's pedestal.
You offered the rare crystal to the creature and can now enter the Collector's lair. Its crystal chamber cannot be accessed by outsiders. You need to find a way to snatch the Mirror Crystal.
The Collector has been defeated. You packed the fragile Mirror Crystal into the device Spectulus gave you. All yo have to do now is to return to the astronomer and to present him your acquisition.
It may have been the excitement or simple nervousness but as soon as Spectulus removed the crystal, it somehow slipped. Unfinishable for all eternity, the device left yet another scholar in despair.
Your first mission is to deliver a warning to the Venoreans. Get a fire bug from Liberty Bay and set their shipyard on fire.
You have set the Venoreans shipyard on fire, report back to Chester!
You have reported back that you have completed your mission, ask Chester for a new mission!
Your first task is to deliver a letter to Gamel in thais, If he is a bit reluctant, be persuasive.
Gamel sent his thugs on you, defeat them and deliver the letter to Gamel!
After defeating Gamel's thugs, he found you to be persuasive enough to accept the letter. Report back to Uncle!
You have reported back that you have completed your task. Ask Uncle for a new mission!
Emma has requested that you steal a Nature Magic Spellbook in the Edron academy.
You have delivered the Nature Magic Spellbook to Emma, ask her for a new mission!
Your next mission is to find some information about one of their missing agents in The Green Claw Swamp.
You have delivered the Black Knight's notes to Chester, ask him for a new mission!
Your next task is to retrieve a file named AH-X17L89.
You have delivered the file named AH-X17L89 to Uncle, ask him for a new mission!
Emma has requested that you retrieve a Rotten Heart of a Tree from the Black Knight Villa in Greenclaw swamp north-west of Venore.
You have delivered the Rotten Heart of a Tree to Emma, ask her for a new mission!
Your next mission is to retrieve some evidence that the traders in Port Hope are up to no good!
You have found the evidence, report back to Chester!
You have reported back that you have completed your mission, ask Chester for a new mission!

mission.name: Mission 3: What Men are Made of

missionstate.description: Your next task is to bring a barrel of beer to the Secret Tavern in the sewers of Carlin.
On your way to the Secret Tavern in the sewers you were attacked by amazons trying to stop you! Deliver the barrel of beer to Karl.
You have delivered the barrel of beer to Karl, report back to Uncle!
You have reported back that you have completed your task, ask Uncle for a new mission!
Emma has requested that you damage the Ironhouse of Venore, use the Case of Rust Bugs on the keyhole in the cellar of the ironhouse.
The bugs are at work! Report back to Emma.
You have reported back that you have completed your mission, ask her for a new mission!
Your next mission is to investigate for some documents in Hellgate.
You have delivered the documents to Chester, ask him for a new mission!
Your next task is to travel to the Black Knight's Villa and kill the Black Knight!
You have killed the Black Knight, report back to Uncle!
You have reported back that you have completed your task, ask Uncle for a new mission!
Emma has requested that you retrieve the Building Plans for a ship from the Venore shipyard.
You have delivered the Building Plans to Emma, ask her for a new mission!
Your next mission is to travel to the southern barbarians camp and place false evidence!
You have placed the false evidence! Report back to Chester.
You have reported back that you have completed your mission, ask Chester for a new mission!
Your next task is to travel to the Isle of the Kings and find a ring.
You have delivered the ring to Uncle, ask him for a new mission!
Emma has requested that you find some hints in the ruins of Dark Cathedral.
You have delivered the Suspicious Documents to Emma, ask her for a new mission!
Your next mission is to disguise yourself as an amazon and destroy a beer casket in the north-east corner in the cellar of Svargrond's Tavern.
You have succesfully destroyed the beer casket disguised as an amazon, report back to Chester!
You have reported back that you have completed your mission, ask Chester for a new mission!

mission.name: Mission 6: A Little Bribe Won't Hurt

missionstate.description: Your next task is to bribe a barbarian in the large barbarian camp with a weapons crate.
You have bribed Freezhild with the weapons create! Report back to Uncle.
You have reported back that you have completed your task, ask Uncle for a new mission!
Emma has requested that you go to the Isle of the Kings and retrieve a book.
You have delivered the book to Emma, ask her for a new mission!
A Mad Technomancer in Kazordoon is trying to blackmail the city! Kill him and bring back his beard as proof.
You have reported back that you have completed your mission, you are now a Special Agent!

mission.name: Omruc's Treasure
mission.description: You defeated Omruc and received a helmet adornment

mission.name: Thalas' Treasure
mission.description: You defeated Thalas and received a Gem Holder

mission.name: Diphtrah's Treasure
mission.description: You defeated Dipthrah and received a Damaged Helmet

mission.name: Mahrdis' Treasure
mission.description: You defeated Mahrdis and received a Helmet Ornament

mission.name: Vashresamun's Treasure
mission.description: You solved the musical riddles of Vashresamun's Tomb and received a left horn.

mission.name: Morguthis' Treasure
mission.description: You defeated Morguthis and received a Right Horn

mission.name: Rahemos' Treasure
mission.description: You defeated Rahemos and received a Helmet Piece

missionstate.description: Find whisper moss in the dworc settlement south of Port Hope and bring it back to Hairycles.
You have completed the first mission. Hairycles was happy about the whisper moss you gave to him. He might have another mission for you.
Hairycles asked you to bring him cough syrup from a human settlement. A healer might know more about this medicine.
You have completed the second mission. Hairycles was happy about the cough syrup you gave to him. He might have another mission for you.
Hairycles asked you to bring him a magical scroll from the lizard settlement Chor.
You have completed the third mission. Hairycles appreciated that you brought the scroll to him and will try to read it. Maybe he has another mission for you later.
Since Hairycles was not able to read the scroll you brought him, he asked you dig for a tomb in the desert to the east. Proceed in this tomb until you find an obelisk between red stones and read it.
You have completed the fourth mission. Hairycles read your mind and can now translate the lizard scroll. He might have another mission for you.
Hairycles wants to create a life charm for the ape people. He needs a hydra egg since it has strong regenerating powers.
You have completed the fifth mission. Hairycles attempts to create a might charm for the protection of the ape people. He might have another mission for you later.
Hairycles need a witches' cap mushroom which is supposed to be hidden in a dungeon deep under Fibula.
You have completed the sixth mission. You brought the witches' cap mushroom back to Hairycles. He might have another mission for you.
Hairycles is worried about an ape cult which drinks some strange fluid that the lizards left behind. Go to the old lizard temple under Banuta and destroy three of the casks there with a crowbar.
You have completed the seventh mission. You found the old lizard ruins under Banuta and destroyed three of the casks with snake blood. Hairycles might have another mission for you.
The apes now need a symbol of their faith. Speak with the blind prophet in a cave to the northeast and go to the Forbidden Land. Find a hair of the giant, holy ape Bong and bring it back.
You completed the eighth mission. Hairycles gladly accepted the hair of the ape god which you brought him. He told you to have one final mission for you.
Go into the deepest catacombs under Banuta and destroy the monument of the snake god with the hammer that Hairycles gave to you.
You successfully destroyed the monument of the snake god. As reward, you can buy sacred statues from Hairycles. If you haven't done so yet, you should also ask him for a shaman outfit.
You have found a fisherman called Santiago, who has a little problem. Maybe you should talk to him again to find out more.
Santiago asked you to go into his house. Upstairs you will find a chest. You can keep what you find inside of it. Once you got that, talk to Santiago again.
You have found Santiago's Coat and reported back to him. Your quest is not done yet, you should talk to him a bit more.
Santiago gave you a weapon. After equipping it, go to the cellar of his house to find out about the cockroach plague.
You brought the cockroach legs to Santiago. He still has something to tell you though.
Santiago asked you, if those cockroaches hurt you. You should reply to him!
Santiago has a valuable lesson for you. You should talk to him again.
Santiago showed you how some monsters might hurt you. Better to talk to him to learn a way to heal yourself.
Santiago gave you some fish! Just 'use' it to eat it and regain health. Afterwards, you should talk to Santiago again.
Santiago asked you if you had seen Zirella. Don't let him wait for the answer.
You have helped Santiago a lot by killing the cokcroaches in his cellar. In exchange, he gave you equipment and some valuable experience. Well done!
You have a vague idea that Zirella might need you for collecting firewood, but you don't know yet where to get it. You should talk to her again.
You know that the branches Zirella needs might be gotten from dead trees in the forest south of here, but you don't know the details yet. You should talk to her again.
You have learned that you need to 'Use' the dead tree to break a branch from it, but there is some information missing. You should talk to Zirella again.
You have learned that you can push the branch which you've broken from a dead tree by 'Drag & Drop', but you still need some information. You should talk to Zirella again.
You know that you have to 'Use' the branch. Then leftclick with the changed cursor on the cart. Now you just have to tell Zirella that you will help her.
Go into the forest south of here and look for trees without leaves. 'Use' one to break a branch from it, then drag & drop the branch back to her cart and 'Use' it with the cart.
You have brought a branch to Zirella, congratulations! You should talk to her again for your reward.
You have helped Zirella by collecting wood for her. The reward can be found in her house.
You found another person named Carlos. You should talk to him learn how to change your outfit.
Carlos taught you how to change your outfit. Now he seems to be wanting a small favour from you. Talk to him again to learn more.
Carlos asked you whether you could bring him some food. Talk to him again to learn how to find food here.
Carlos asked you to hunt some deer and rabbits and loot them to find a piece of ham or meat. However you haven't agreed yet, so you should tell him that you'll do it.
You agreed to bring Carlos some food. Hunt some deer or rabbit until you find a piece of meat or ham talk to Carlos again.
To sell the meat or ham to Carlos, talk to him and ask him for a 'trade'.
You sucessfully learnt how to change your outfit and how to trade with NPCs. Time to head over the bridge to Rookgaard!
You have passed the bridge to Rookgaard and have sucessfully completed the Tutorial. If you want to skip the tutorial in the future with a new character, simply say 'skip tutorial' to Santiago.
Travel to Thais and keep your eyes open for something that might give you a clue on the supply thief.
You have found the potential supply thief - Partos in Thais seemed very suspicious. Baa'leal might be interested in this matter.
You have reported the case to Baa'leal. He seemed very satisfied and told you that Alesar might have another mission for you.

mission.name: Efreet Mission 2: The Tear of Daraman

missionstate.description: Sneak into Ashta'daramai and steal a "Tear of Daraman". For more information about these gems visit the Efreet library.
You have successfully managed to steal a Tear of Daraman from Ashta'daramai. Bring it to Alesar.
You have delivered Daraman's Tear. Alesar seemed very satisfied and told you that Malor himself might have another mission for you.
Malor asked you to find Fa'hradin's sleeping lamp in the orc fortress at Ulderek's Rock. Then, sneak into Ashta'daramai and exchange Gabel's sleeping lamp with Fa'hradin's lamp.
You successfully exchanged the lamps. Malor will be happy to hear about this.
The Efreet are very satisfied with your help. King Malor allowed you to trade with Yaman and Alesar.
Bring a cookbook of the dwarven kitchen to Bo'ques.
You have delivered the cookbook. Bo'ques seemed very satisfied and told you that Fa'hradin might have another mission for you.
Fa'hradin asked you to sneak into the Efreet fortress Mal'ouqhah and find their undercover spy. The codeword is PIEDPIPER.
You have delivered the spyreport. Fa'hradin seemed impressed and told you that Gabel himself might have another mission for you.
You have promised Rata'Mari cheese. Once you deliver some to him, he will hand over his spyreport.
You got Rata'Mari's spyreport. He seems to be quite happy with the cheese you brought him.
Gabel asked you to find Fa'hradin's sleeping lamp in the orc fortress at Ulderek's Rock. Then, sneak into Mal'ouqhah and exchange Malor's sleeping lamp with Fa'hradin's lamp.
You successfully exchanged the lamps. Gabel will be happy to hear about this.
The Marid deeply appreciate your help. King Gabel allowed you to trade with Haroun and Nah'bob.
Deliver 3 Gear Wheels to Xorlosh.
You sucessfully helped Xorlosh in repairing the elevator. You can now enter the teleporter to the eastern part of the mine.
Nokmir told you that he is falsely accused of being a thief. You could help him by talking to Grombur about the case. Furthermore you should try to find that ring which belongs to Rerun.
You should talking to Grombur about Nokmir.
You should try to find that ring which belongs to Rerun everywhere in the mine.
You have found Rerun's ring. Bring the ring to the emperor Rehal and talk to him about Nokmir.
You informed emperor Rehal about your recent discoveries and he acquitted Nokmir of being a thief.
You told Nokmir about his acquittal and he granted you access to the northern mine.
You won the battle against the malicious undead dragon Pythius the Rotten. He granted you firewalker boots as a reward.
Bake a Chocolate Cake and bring it to Bolfona at the bar.
Report back to Frafnar by telling him about the mission.
You told Frafnar that you did everything he asked you to do. You may now enter the western part of the mine.
Grombur asked you to get him a cask of dwarven brown ale. You heard that Boozer in Venore tried to brew some. Maybe you should pay him a visit.
Grombur liked the ale and you are now allowed to enter his part of the mine.

Find Sniffler the husky of Iskan. He should be somewhere north west of the town. He is probably marking his territory so you should be able to find his trace. Call him sniffler and feed him with meat.
Tell Iskan that you found and feed Sniffler
You are now a friend of Iskan and can ask him for a passage to Nibelor. You should ask Hjaern in Nibelor if you can help him.
Chakoyas may use the ice for a passage to the west and attack Svargrond. Use the rocks at east of nibelor on at least three of these places and the chakoyas probably won't be able to pass the ice.
You have broke 1 of 3 icepassages
You have broke 2 of 3 icepassages
You have broke 3 of 3 icepassages! Tell Hjaern your mission!
You should ask Silfind if you can help her in some matters.
Siflind send you to travel to a distant land to get ants from an Ant-Hill to perform ecological terrorism on some pirates on Tyrsung. Just use the jug on an anthill.

Now head back to Svargrond and go to Buddel, the drunk sailor in southern Svargrond, and ask him to take you to Tyrsung. Now go all the way to the southern shores where you find a outpost. Go to the bottom deck and use the jug with the western mast
Go tell Siflind that you released the ants and aks her for mission!
Siflind gave you a Vial of Paint to use on some Baby Seals. Go back to Tyrsung and follow the shore from Buddel south. Use the Vial of Paint on three of these seals.
Go tell Siflind that you painted the seals and aks her for mission!
The first things needed are 5 bat wings to brew a berserker elixir. Bring her them!
The next items Siflind need are 4 bear paws. Bring her them!
The next items Siflind need are 3 bonelord eyes. Bring her them!
The next items Siflind need are 2 fish fins. Bring her them!
The next item Siflind need is a green dragon scale. Bring her that!
You helped Siflind to defend Svargrond. Now Nilsor need help, go ask him for mission.
To cure Nilsor dogs, bring him the 1st of 7 ingredients: a Part of the Sun Adorer Cactus. Only an ordinary kitchen knife will be precise enough to produce the ingredient weneed.
To cure Nilsor dogs, bring him the 2nd of 7 ingredients: Geyser Water in a Waterskin. Use it on a geyser that is NOT active. The water of active geysers is far too hot.
To cure Nilsor dogs, bring him the 3rd of 7 ingredients: Fine Sulphur. Use an ordinary kitchen spoon on an inactive lava hole.
To cure Nilsor dogs, bring him the 4th of 7 ingredients: the Frostbite Herb. You can find it on mountain peaks. You will need to cut it with a fine kitchen knife.

To cure Nilsor dogs, bring him the 5th of 7 ingredients: Purple Kiss Blossom. The purple kiss is a plant that grows in a place called jungle. You will have to use a kitchen knife to harvest its blossom.
To cure Nilsor dogs, bring him the 6th of 7 ingredients: the Hydra Tongue. The hydra tongue is a common pest plant in warmer regions. You might find one in a shop.

To cure Nilsor dogs, bring him the 7th of 7 ingredients: Spores of a Giant Glimmercap Mushroom. The giant glimmercap mushroom exists in caves and other preferably warm and humid places. Use an ordinary kitchen spoon on a mushroom to collectits spores.
You found all ingredients to cure Nilsor dogs, ask him for mission. You can now travel by Dog Sleds to Inukaya.
Hjaern might have a mission for you. So maybe you go and talk to him.
Hjaern send you to find someone in Svargrond who can give you a passage to Helheim and seek the reason for the unrest there.
You discovered the necromantic altar and should report Hjaern about it.
Get out of Nibelor and go to the Svargrond Explorer's Society. Ask Lurik for the mission.
Get to the raider camp, then follow to the extreme south where you find lots of barbarians. Near the southern most coastline, try looking for the NPC Nor. Ask him about Memory Crystal.
Go back to Lurik and deliver him the memory crystal.
Give Lurik some time to evaluate the information (ca. 5min). Then talk to him again about your mission.
Find the entrance of the Formorgar Mines. Find some hint or someone who is willing to talk about what is going on there.
You found a old and tattered written paper in a skeleton next to a Restless Soul, you can only make out a signature: Tylaf, apprentice of Hjaern. Ask Hjaern about Tylaf.
Go back to the mine and ask the restless soul about his story.
You already have listen to his story!
The Cultists plan is to create a new demon army for their master to conquer the world. Hjaern and the other shamans must learn about it! Hurry before its too late.
The Cultists plan is to create a new demon army for their master to conquer the world. Hjaern and the other shamans are already informed!
Hjaern gave you a spirit charm of cold. Travel to the mines and find four special obelisks to mark them with the charm.
1 of 4 obelisks are marked.
2 of 4 obelisks are marked.
3 of 4 obelisks are marked.
Once all 4 obelisks are marked report back to Hjaern.
You got the Norseman outfit and you have access to the Yakchal room deep in the Formorgar Mines.
Your mission is to investigate the 5 guards in Thais regarding the Heretic behavior. Tim, Kulag, Grof, Miles and Walter are their names. If you do well you see a holy sprite on you.
You investigated 1 of 5 guards in Thais.
You investigated 2 of 5 guards in Thais.
You investigated 3 of 5 guards in Thais.
You investigated 4 of 5 guards in Thais.
You investigated 5 of 5 guards in Thais. Get back to Thais and report your mission to Henricus.
You investigated all guards in Thais.

Henricus tells you to get The Witches' Grimoire, he sends you to Femor Hills where you can fly to the witches' mountain, say Eclipse to Uzon and he will take you there. Use the vial of holy water that he gives you on the big cauldron and open the chest to your left, then bring the witches' grimoire to Henricus.
Find the witches' grimoire and bring it to Henricus.
You already brought the witches' grimoire to Henricus.
Henricus wants you to find the Dwarfish Vampire Hunter, Storkus, located west of the Dwarf Bridge. It's good idea bring your 20 Vampire Dusts with you to save some time.
Go Back to Storkus the Dwarf and ask for Mission.

Now Storkus wants you to kill a vampire lord, The Count in the Green Claw Swamp, The Count is located near to the Blood Herb Quest. To summon The Count, you must use the coffin in the center of the room. Kill it and bring The Ring of the Count to Storkus.
Kill The Count and bring his ring to Storkus the Dwarf and ask for Mission.
Return to Henricus and tell him that you finished your job here.
Get back to Thais and report your mission to Henricus.
Henricus will gave you a Special Flask (vial of holy water). Go to Liberty Bay and use the vial on an old house. Use this vial of holy water on that spot to drive out the evil being.
Kill the Pirate Ghost and get back to Thais and report your mission to Henricus.
You already cleaned the abandoned and haunted house in Liberty, ask Henricus for mission.
Henricus wants 20 Demonic Essences as a proof of your accomplishments.
Now ask Henricus for outfit to get the Demon Hunter Outfit.
You got the Demon Hunter Outfit! Ask Henricus for mission to unlock more addons.
Henricus wants you to kill a demon called Ungreez. Head to Edron Hero Cave and go down a few levels.
You killed Ungreez, report your mission to Henricus.
You got the the first addon of Demon Hunter Outfit! Ask Henricus for mission to unlock more addons.
Your mission is to go to the Demon Forge and slay seven of The Ruthless Seven Minions. The Demon Forge is located in the Edron Hero Cave, through a portal after the Vampire Shield Quest.
You destroyed the shadow nexus! Get back to Thais and report your mission to Henricus.
Now ask to Henricus for a outfit. He will give you the 2nd addon of the Demon Hunter Outfits.
You got the the second addon of Demon Hunter Outfit! Go now to the reward room and choose one wisely!
You have completed The Inquisition Quest! You can now buy the Blessing of the Inquisition!
Ongulf sends you to explore the passage to the east of farmine.
You have found the passage through the mountains and can report Ongulf about your success.
You already reported Ongulf your success! Ask Ongulf for new mission!
Ongulf will tell you that he needs to send a message to the dwarves in Kazordoon. Travel there and then walk to the Dwarf Mines to the west. Cross the two rivers and find Melfar.
Melfar gave you a Flask with Beaver Bait that you must use on the 3 trees(Trees will be marked on your map).
You marked 1 of 3 trees with Beaver Bait in near the Dwarf Mines
You marked 2 of 3 trees with Beaver Bait in near the Dwarf Mines
You marked all 3 trees with Beaver Bait in near the Dwarf Mines. Return to talk to Melfar before heading back to Farmine.
Return to Ongulf and report your mission!
You need to find the tribe which lives in the mountains. Find some vines in this mountain, climb up there and find out who is spying on us!
Return to Ongulf and report your mission about primitive humans.
You already reported Ongulf about primitive humans! Ask Ongulf for new mission!
Head back to the levers and this time use the left one. Go North through the tunnel of Stone Golems. Kill the boss, Shard of Corruption at the end of the tunnel.
You killed the Shard of Corruption. Return to Ongulf and report your mission!

This mission consists of getting support from 6 people (King Tibianus in Thais, Leeland in Venore, Angus in Port Hope, Wyrdin in the Ivory Towers, Telas in Edron, Humgolf in Kazordoon around Tibia. You need to ask for farmine and then you either need to Flatter, Threaten, Impress, Bluff, Reason or Plea him!

You got support from 1 of 6 people, King Tibianus in Thais, Leeland in Venore, Angus in Port Hope, Wyrdin in the Ivory Towers, Telas in Edron and Humgolf in Kazordoon. You need to ask for farmine and then you either need to Flatter, Threaten, Impress, Bluff, Reason or Plea him!

You got support from 2 of 6 people, King Tibianus in Thais, Leeland in Venore, Angus in Port Hope, Wyrdin in the Ivory Towers, Telas in Edron and Humgolf in Kazordoon. You need to ask for farmine and then you either need to Flatter, Threaten, Impress, Bluff, Reason or Plea him!

You got support from 3 of 6 people, King Tibianus in Thais, Leeland in Venore, Angus in Port Hope, Wyrdin in the Ivory Towers, Telas in Edron and Humgolf in Kazordoon. You need to ask for farmine and then you either need to Flatter, Threaten, Impress, Bluff, Reason or Plea him!

You got support from 4 of 6 people, King Tibianus in Thais, Leeland in Venore, Angus in Port Hope, Wyrdin in the Ivory Towers, Telas in Edron and Humgolf in Kazordoon. You need to ask for farmine and then you either need to Flatter, Threaten, Impress, Bluff, Reason or Plea him!

You got support from 5 of 6 people, King Tibianus in Thais, Leeland in Venore, Angus in Port Hope, Wyrdin in the Ivory Towers, Telas in Edron and Humgolf in Kazordoon. You need to ask for farmine and then you either need to Flatter, Threaten, Impress, Bluff, Reason or Plea him!
You got support from all needed people to help farmine! Return to Ongulf and report your mission!
Go to Curos, leader of the Orcs, in the middle of the Zao Steppe in the north-east area of an Orc camp. Ask for a mission and accept it.
Enter the ring of battle, close to Curos quarter. Face Mooh'Tah Master in a battle and survive for two minutes. Return to him after you have passed this test.
You passed the test of Curos. Return to Ongulf and report your mission!
You now have to contact the Lizards, the real rulers of Zao. Find them, contact them, talk to them, scare them, bribe them, whatever.
You have been trapped! Find a way out!
You found the Lizards!

mission.name: Mission 08: An Offer You Can't Refuse

missionstate.description: Take the boat at the northern of Dragonblaze Peaks to tournament Isle. Ask Zurak for a passage. There you'll learn anything you need to know about the great tournament. Ask there Chrak for the battle.
You agreed the Offer.
You have to go into the Arena with another player, because 2 players are needed, at the same time, to enter. Choose your companion wisely!
You have won! Report Chrak your mission about the battle.
Go back to Farmine and talk to Ongulf about your mission.

mission.name: Mission 10: New Horizons
mission.description: You now have permission to use the Magic Carpet on the mountain above Farmine, Cael now accepts more Tomes of Knowledge from you and you got the Warmaster Outfit!

missionstate.description: You brought the fist Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt more about the lizard culture. Pompan will sell you dragon tapestries from now on.
You brought the second Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt more about the minotaur culture. Pompan will sell you minotaur backpacks from now on.
You brought the third Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt more about the last stand of the draken culture. Esrik will sell you lizard weapon rack from now on.

You brought the fourth Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt something interesting about a certain food that the lizardmen apparently prepare. Swolt will trade you a bunch of ripe rice for 10 rice balls from now on.
You brought the fifth Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt more about the last stand of the lizards in the South, Zzaion. Pompan will sell you lizard backpacks from now on.
You brought the sixth Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt a few things about the primitive human culture on this continent. Cael will sell you War Drums and Didgeridoo from now on.
You brought the seventh Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt something interesting about the Zao steppe. Now you to use the snake teleport at the peak of the mountain.
You brought the eighth Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt a few things about an illness. Now you can enter a corruption hole in the north-eastern end of Zao.
You brought the ninth Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt something interesting about the Draken origin. Esrik will buy lizard equipment from you now.

You brought the tenth Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt more about the last stand of the lizard dynasty. Now you can enter the Zao Palace. It is situated deep underground, below the mountain base of the Lizards.
You brought the eleventh Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt something interesting about dragons and their symbolism. You can buy a Dragon Statue from NPC Cael after you bring him a Red Lantern.

You brought the twelfth Tome of Knowledge to Cael. He learnt something about reveals some of the power structures in Zao. Cael will now make a Dragon Throne for you after you bring him a Red Piece of Cloth. He will reward you with 5000 experience points for each extra tome you give to him.
Kevin wants you to travel with Captain Bluebear to Carlin.
Kevin wants you to travel with Uzon in Femor Hills to Edron.
Kevin wants you to travel with Captain Seahorse to Venore.
Kevin wants you to travel with Brodrosch to Cormaya
You have checked the Postal Routes, report back to Kevin!
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Kevin wants you to fix one of their Mailboxes located on Folda with a crowbar.
You have fixed the mailbox, report back to Kevin!
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Kevin wants you to deliver a bill to the stage magician David Brassacres. He's hiding from his creditors somewhere in Venore.
You have delivered the bill to the stage magician David Brassacres, report back to Kevin!
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Kevin has asked you to deliver 20 Bones to him.
You have delivered 20 Bones to Kevin.
Kevin has asked you to retrieve the present behind the door on the lower right side of his room and deliver it to Dermot in Fibula.
Deliver the present to Dermot in Fibula.
You have delivered the present to Dermot, report back to Kevin!
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Kevin has asked you to travel to Venore and negotiate with Hugo for new uniforms.
Hugo said that his dog ate the last dress pattern they used and he has no clue where Kevin Postner got it from, go ask Kevin.
Kevin wants you to ask the great Technomancer Talphion in Kazordoon for the technical details.
Talphion will send a copy to Kevin, report back to Kevin.
Kevin wants you tk ask Queen Eloise of Carlin for the perfect colours.
Queen Eloise said she will send some color samples via mail to Kevin, report back to Kevin.
Kevin has asked you to go to Noodles and find out what he dislikes the most: mouldy cheese, a piece of fur or a banana skin.
Noodles seems to like banana skin, check if he likes dirty fur.
Noodles seems to like dirty fur, check if he likes mouldy cheese.
Noodles dislikes mouldy cheese! Report back to Kevin.
Kevin wants you to tell Hugo that they order those uniforms.
Hugo has agreed to make the uniforms, report back to Kevin!
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Kevin wants you to bring him the measurements of Benjamin, Lokur, Dove, Liane, Chrystal and Olrik.
You have received the measurements from 1 of 6 post officers.
You have received the measurements from 2 of 6 post officers.
You have received the measurements from 3 of 6 post officers.
You have received the measurements from 4 of 6 post officers.
You have received the measurements from 5 of 6 post officers.
You have received all measurements, report back to Kevin!
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Kevin wants you to find the missing courier Waldo or at least his posthorn.
You have found Waldos posthorn.
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Kevin wants you to deliver som letters to Santa Claus on Vega.
You have retrieved the letters, deliver them to Santa Claus on Vega.
You have delivered the letters to Santa Claus on Vega.
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Kevin wants you to deliver a letter to Markwin, king of Mintwallin from his mother.
You have delivered the letter to Markwin.
You have reported back that you have completed the mission.
Assistant Postman
Grand Postman
Grand Postman for Special Operations
Arch Postman
You need to return to Marina and ask her for a date with Ocelus.
You need to return to Ocelus with the bad news.
Ocelus told you to get a poem for him, if you didn't buy one already, head to Ab'Dendriel and buy a Love Poem from Elvith.
You need to go recite the poem to Marina and impress her with the Djinn's romantic and poetic abilities.
After reciting the poem to Marina, she decided to date Ocelus and release Ray Striker from her spell.
You need to find the man-stealing mermaid and try to break her spell over poor Raymond, the mermaid Marina is near the northern coast of the island.
You discovered that she does in fact have a spell on him, and will not release him unless someone better comes along.
You are a true master in reciting love poems now. No mermaid will be able to resist if you ask for a date!

mission.name: Access to Goroma
mission.description: After helping Jack Fate to collect the 30 woodpieces, Jack Fate in Liberty Bay will bring you to Goroma.

mission.name: Access to Laguna Island
mission.description: After arranging a date for Marina and Ocelus, you are allowed to use Marina's sea turtles. They will bring you to the idyllic Laguna Islands.

mission.name: Access to Meriana
mission.description: After earning the trust of the governor's daughter Eleonore, Captain Waverider in Liberty Bay will bring you to Meriana if you tell him the secret codeword 'peg leg'.

missionstate.description: You have begun Chondur's ritual. Bring him a fresh dead chicken so that he can begin to create a counterspell which will allow you to pass the magical barrier on Goroma.
You have begun Chondur's ritual. Bring him a fresh dead rat so that he can continue creating a counterspell which will allow you to pass the magical barrier on Goroma.
You have begun Chondur's ritual. Bring him a fresh dead black sheep so that he can complete his counterspell which will allow you to pass the magical barrier on Goroma.
You may pass the energy barrier on Goroma. The counterspell Chondur created for you with his ritual will allow you to withstand the evil magic of the cultist.
You told Eleonore to run a small errand. Deliver the 200 gold pieces she gave to the herbalist Charlotta in the south-western part of Liberty Bay.
You delivered the gold to Charlotta. Return to Eleonore and tell her the secret password: peg leg
You promised to find Eleonore's lost ring. She told you that a parrot stole it from her dressing table and flew to the nearby mountains. You might need a rake to retrieve the ring.
You found the ring. Return it to Eleonore.
You returned the ring to Eleonore.
Dorian wants you to collect 10 elephant tusks and deliver them to him.
You delivered the ten tusks to Dorian.
Dorian wants you to steal a vase from Sarina, the owner of Carlin's general store.
You have stolen the vase, report back to Dorian!
You have delivered the stolen vase to Dorian, ask him for a new mission!
Your task is to somehow convince Oswald to hand you an invitation to the king's ball.
You have received the invitation to the King's ball, report back to Dorian!
You have delivered the invitation to Dorian, ask him for a new mission!
Dorian wants you to find a forger in the outlaw camp, go talk to Snake eye.
Snake Eye told you to visit Ahmet in Ankrahmun.
Ahmet told you that he will only help a friend and asked you to kill at least one Nomad.
You have killed a Nomad, go back to Ahmet!
You have received the forged documents from Ahmet, next is to get a disguise from Percybald in Venore!
You have received the dwarf disguise from Percybald. Now go do the deal with Nurik.
You have traded the forged documents for the painting, report back to Dorian.
You have delivered the painting to Dorian, ask him for a new mission!
Your mission is to travel to Tiquanda. Fina a hidden smuggler cave to the north of Port Hope and try to retrieve the valuable goblet which Dorian is looking for. Once you got it, bring it to him.
You have delivered the golden goblet to Dorian, ask him for a new mission!
Dorian wants you to fishnap Theodore Loveless' fish, first you need to get the key to his room. Talk to Chantalle in Liberty Bay.
You have received the key for Theodore Loveless' room, time to fishnap his fish!
You have fishnapped Theodore Loveless' fish, deliver it to Dorian.
You have delivered the fish to Dorian, ask him for a new mission!
Your current task is to find compromising information about one of the Venore city guards, no matter how. A good starting point might be in their barracks.
You have delivered the compromising letter to Dorian, ask him for a new mission!
Dorian wants you to deliver a message to his competitors in the dark cathedral.
You have put up the message, report back to Dorian.
You have reported back that you have completed the mission, Dorian now allows you to trade with Black Bert.
Your first mission for becoming a recognized trader is to bring the traveling salesman Rashid a Deer Trophy.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
Your mission is to get the package from Willard the weapon dealer at Edron.
Willard forgot to pick it up from Snake Eye at Outlaw Camp. So he wants you to go and pick it up from Snake Eye.
Take the package just next door.
Now bring back the package to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
Rashid wants you to pick his special order from Miraia in Darashia. But you have to be quick, Scarab cheese can rot really fast in high temperature.
Now quickly bring back the Scarab cheese to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
Rashid have ordered a special elven vase from Briasol in Ab'Dendriel. He asks you to buy it from Briasol and bring it back.\nBut you should be carefully, since the vase is very fragile.
Now carefully bring the vase back to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
This time, Rashid is testing your trading skills to buy a Crimson Sword from Uzgod. But it have to be less than 400 gold coins and the quality has to be perfect.
Now bring the sword back to Rashid.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
Rashid wants you to bring him a Goldfish Bowl.
You have completed this mission. Talk with Rashid to continue.
Rashid has declare you as one of his recognized traders, and now you are able to trade with him anytime..

mission.name: The Hidden Seal
mission.description: You broke the first seal.

mission.name: The Seal of Logic
mission.description: You broke the sixth seal.

mission.name: The Seal of True Path
mission.description: You broke the fifth seal.

mission.name: The Seal of Sacrifice
mission.description: You broke the fourth seal.

mission.name: The Seal of Demonrage
mission.description: You broke the third seal.

mission.name: The Plague Seal
mission.description: You broke the second seal.

mission.name: All Seals
mission.description: You broke all the seals.

missionstate.description: You have to defeat all enemies in this mode.
You have defeated all enemies in this mode.
You have to defeat all enemies in this mode.
You have defeated all enemies in this mode.
You have to defeat all enemies in this mode.
You have defeated all enemies in this mode.

mission.name: Access to the Isle of Kings

missionstate.description: You are a friend of Dalbrect. Since you returned his family brooch he will sail you to the Isle of Kings unless you do something stupid.
Investigate the catacombs. Abbot Costello should be interested in information about brother Fugio.
You returned Fugio's Diary. Costello was very thankful about your help and gave you a blessed ankh as reward.
Daniel Steelsoul in Edron wants you to infiltrate the Edron Orc Cave and destroy 4 Spider Eggs.
You destroyed 1 of 4 Spider Eggs in the Edron Orc Cave
You destroyed 2 of 4 Spider Eggs in the Edron Orc Cave
You destroyed 3 of 4 Spider Eggs in the Edron Orc Cave
You destroyed all Spider Eggs in the Edron Orc Cave, report back to Daniel Steelsoul!
You have completed the Quest!

Rabaz in Farmine asked you to collect samples from rare plant specimen in Zao. Go to the storage room to the west and receive the Botany Almanach. Find then the Giant Dreadcoil and use your Obsidian Knife on it to obtain a sample.
Now you must find the second plant, a Giant Verminous and use your Obsidian Knife on it to obtain a sample.
You found the two samples, report back to Rabaz in Farmine!
You have completed the Quest!

mission.name: Graves Sanctified - In Progress
mission.description: You sanctified |STATE| of 15 graves.

missionstate.description: Search the Cursed Bone Pit in the dungeon north of Thais and dig for a well-preserved human bone for Muriel.
You have found a desecrated bone for Muriel.
You helped Muriel to obtain a desecrated bone.
Go to the white raven monastery and ask for some holy water for Amanda.
You got the holy water from the white raven monastery. Go back to Amanda and report about your mission.
Sanctify every single grave at the unholy graveyard north of Edron with the holy water.
You have sanctified all graves at the unholy graveyard of Edron. Report about your mission at Amanda.
You helped Amanda by sanctifying the cursed graveyard of Edron.
Padreia in Carlin asked you to exterminate the slimes in the sewers of Carlin by poisoning their spawn pool.
You poisoned the spawn pool of the slimes in the sewers of Carlin. Report to Padreia about your mission.
You successfully helped Padreia in saving Carlin from a slimy disease.
Boozer in Vernore asked you to bring him some special dwarven brown ale. You may find some in the brewery in Kazordoon.
You found the special dwarven brown ale. Bring it to Boozer in Vernore.
You have completed The Ultimate Booze Quest!
Your mission is to find the Holy Skull. It is in a cave in the northern orc settlement, which is located north-west on the Zao Steppe.
You found the Holy Skull. Retrieve it to Lazaran in the Zao Mountains.
You brought Lazaran the Holy Skull. Ask him for new mission!
You received the Skull of a Caveman and need to explore the world, letting the skull see everything. You need to stand at the highest place of Edron.
You received the Skull of a Caveman and need to explore the world, letting the skull see everything. You need to stand at the highest place of Ab'dendriel.
You received the Skull of a Caveman and need to explore the world, letting the skull see everything. You need to stand at the highest place of Femor Hills.
You received the Skull of a Caveman and need to explore the world, letting the skull see everything. You need to stand at the highest place of Darashia
You received the Skull of a Caveman and need to explore the world, letting the skull see everything. You need to stand at the highest place of Ankrahmun
You received the Skull of a Caveman and need to explore the world, letting the skull see everything. You need to stand at the highest place of Port Hope
You received the Skull of a Caveman and need to explore the world, letting the skull see everything. You need to stand at the highest place of Liberty Bay
You received the Skull of a Caveman and need to explore the world, letting the skull see everything. You need to stand at the highest place of Yalahar
You received the Skull of a Caveman and need to explore the world, letting the skull see everything. You need to stand at the highest place of Svargrond
You received the Skull of a Caveman and need to explore the world, letting the skull see everything. You need to stand at the highest place of Thais
You received the Skull of a Caveman and need to explore the world, letting the skull see everything. You need to stand at the highest place of Carlin
You visited all the highest places with the skull. Turn the skull back to Lazaran and report him your mission!
You turned the skull already back to Lazaran. Ask him for new mission!
Lazaran told you to go to Ulala, who is located above Lazaran.
Ulala told you to dance to please their god Krunus. On the south mountain in the camp you will find the Krunus altar, there are lots of leaves on the ground.
You solved the dance. Head back to Ulala and report your mission!
Now the god Krunus is pleased, another god called Pandor needs to be pleased. Ulala wants you to collect 5 Orc Teeth, 5 Minotaur leathers and 5 Lizard Leathers. Bring them to her.
You brought Ulala 5 Orc Teeth, 5 Minotaur leathers and 5 Lizard Leathers. Ask her for new mission!
The third god which needs to be pleased is called Fasuon. Find the great crystal on top of mountain of Fasuon and pray there for his support!
You already prayed at the great crystal. Report it to Ulala
You have reported back to Ulala that you have completed the mission.
Speak with Lazaran and tell the gods are pleased now.
Bring Lazaran a Pot of brown water for a party after the great hunt.
You brought Lazaran the beer and got a Serpent Crest as reward!

mission.name: What a foolish Quest - Tasks of a Fool

missionstate.description: Cut a flower at the Whiteflower Temple south of Thais. Then report to Bozo about your mission.
You have finished your first mission and should ask Bozo for the next mission.

mission.name: What a foolish Quest - That stinks!

missionstate.description: It sometimes stinks to be a fool. Collect some noxious fumes from a recently slain slime with the special vial. Then report to Bozo about your mission.
You have finished your second mission and should ask Bozo for the next mission.

mission.name: What a foolish Quest - A Piece of Cake

missionstate.description: Get 12 pies from Mirabell in Edron. Then report to Bozo about your mission.
You have finished your third mission and should ask Bozo for the next mission.

mission.name: What a foolish Quest - Fool Spirits

missionstate.description: Get 18 vials of wine for Bozo. Then report to Bozo about your mission.
Exchange the crates in front of Xodet's house and return to Bozo with the swapped crate.
You have finished your fourth mission and should ask Bozo for the next mission.

mission.name: What a foolish Quest - Watch out for the foolish

missionstate.description: Steal the magic watch from the Triangle Tower west of Jakundaf Desert. Then report to Bozo about your mission.
Use the magic watch to steal the beard of the sleeping dwarven emperor.
You have already finished five missions for that fool. You should definitely talk to Bozo about your jester outfit now!

mission.name: What a foolish Quest - The queen of farts

missionstate.description: Get Bozo 4 pieces of minotaur leather.
Get Bozo a piece of giant spider silk.
Ask Bozo about your mission, he might be finished with the whoopee cushion by now.
Place the whoopee cushion on the queen's throne in Carlin by using the cushion with the throne.
You have finished your sixth mission and should ask Bozo for the next mission.

mission.name: What a foolish Quest - For your mice only

missionstate.description: Get the toy mouse of Queen Eloise's cat and show it to Carina, the jeweller in Venore, to scare her.
You have finished your seventh mission and should ask Bozo for the next mission.

mission.name: What a foolish Quest - Smoking is a foolish thing

missionstate.description: Gather some easily inflammable sulphur using a spoon on an inactive lava hole.
You brought Bozo the sulphur. Now cut him some leaves of the jungle dweller bush with a kitchen knife.
You have gathered the ordered ingredients and should ask Bozo for the next mission.
Deliver the exploding cigar to Theodore Loveless in Liberty Bay.
You have finished your eighth mission and should ask Bozo for the next mission.

mission.name: What a foolish Quest - A fool's bargain

missionstate.description: Bozo wants you to fill a vial with the blood of a stalker. Use the vial on a slain stalker immediately after his death. Then report to Bozo about your mission.
Bozo wants you to fill a vial with the ink of a quara constrictor. Use the vial on a slain constrictor immediately after its death. Then report to Bozo about your mission.
You have gathered the ordered ingredients and should ask Bozo for the next mission.
Order 2000 steel shields from Sam. Sign his contract with the magic ink.
You have finished your ninth mission and should ask Bozo for the next mission.

mission.name: What a foolish Quest - A sweet surprise

missionstate.description: Deliver a cookie to Avar Tar, Simon, Ariella, Lorbas, King Markwin, Hjaern, Wyda, Hairycles, the orc king and EITHER Yaman OR Nah'Bob. Then report to Bozo about the mission.
You have finished your tenth mission and should ask Bozo for the next mission.

mission.name: What a foolish Quest - The final foolishness

missionstate.description: Gather 5 pieces of white cloth for Bozo. Then report about your mission.
Travel to Darama and climb the highest point of the Plague Spike to give these pieces of white cloth an old and worn look. Some ancient altar should suit your needs best - use the white cloth on it.
Use your mummy disguise to scare the caliph Kazzan in Darashia. DON'T use the disguise too early or you will fail the quest.
You have finished all of Bozo's missions and you are a complete fool now. Yay!

mission.name: What a foolish Quest - To become a complete fool

missionstate.description: Now that you have a basic outfit, you should talk to Bozo about your missions to gain further rewards.
You must bring Zalamon 3 nails and a piece of wood so that he can make a Marked Crate for you.

Go to the tunnel in eastern Muggy Plains and reach the other side. Try to hide in the dark and avoid being seen at all by using the crate. After that you need to find the rebel hideout and talk to their leader Chartan.
You found the leader of the rebel Chartan and reported him about Zalamon. Ask him for new mission!
Chartan needs you to reactivate the teleport to the Muggy Plains. Head downstairs and into the temple and craft material to repair the teleport. To do this you will need some tools to improvise.
As you give the coal into the pool the corrupted fluid begins to dissolve, leaving purified, refreshing water. The teleporter is reactivated. Report back to Chartan.
Report back to Zalamon for the next mission.
Zalamon gives you a Flask of Plant Poison to destroy plants in the garden of the Emperor to lure out and kill The Keeper to get his tail. The garden is southeast of the rebel hideout.
You killed the Keeper and got his tail. Bring it to Zalamon.
You brought the tail of the Keeper to Zalamon and completed the mission. Ask for the next mission.

Zalamon now wants you to go to Deeper Banuta and get an Ancient Sceptre that will help in the fight against the emperor. On each floor under Deeper Banuta you collect a sceptre part from a Ghost of a Priest. On the 4th and final floor you need to assemble the sceptre..
After you've assembled the Snake Sceptre and fought your way back out, head back to Zalamon and give it to him.
You brought the Snake Sceptre to Zalamon and completed the mission. Ask for the next mission.

Zalamon tells you that you have to go inside the city. From the rebel hideout go out to the gray road and follow it to the southwest. Find the Gate Guardian and ask him for a mission to enter the city.
Now you only have to walk west until you find Zlak inside the big green building.
You went deep inside the city to find Zlak and completed the mission. Ask for the next mission.

mission.name: Mission 06: The Office Job
mission.description: Explore the area where Zlak is to find Lizard Magistratus and kill 4 of them. You currently have |STATE| killed. Report back to Zlak if you finished it.

mission.name: Mission 07: A Noble Cause
mission.description: Explore the area where Zlak is to find Lizard Noble and kill 6 of them. You currently have |STATE| killed. Report back to Zlak if you finished it.

missionstate.description: Your mission is to reach your rebel contact Zizzle in the imperial palace. You need to take the old escape tunnel that leads from the abandoned basement in the north of the ministry to a lift that ends somewhere in the palace.
You have reached your rebel contact Zizzle in the imperial palace.
To enter the inner realms of the Emperor you need to free the mind of a dragon. An interdimensional potion will help you to enter this dream and unleash his consciousness.
You travelled through the Sleeping Dragon dreams and freed his mind.
After solving the riddle, and talking again to the Sleeping Dragon you got a Spiritual Charm. Report back to Zizzle.

You possess the key to enter the inner realms of the emperor. Start with the one in the north-west and work your way clockwise trough the room and kill those manifestation. Then use your sceptre on the remain to destroy the emperor's influence over the crystal.
You possess the key to enter the inner realms of the emperor. You destroyed 1 of 4 emperor's influences.
You possess the key to enter the inner realms of the emperor. You destroyed 2 of 4 emperor's influences.
You possess the key to enter the inner realms of the emperor. You destroyed 3 of 4 emperor's influences.
You possess the key to enter the inner realms of the emperor. You destroyed all emperor's influences.
Your Mission is to kill Zalamon. Step into the teleporter to confront him. Finally use your sceptre on the death body.
Go back to Awareness Of The Emperor and report him your success!
The Emperor has promised you wealth beyond measure. Go claim it in the ministry.
You completed this Quest!
